TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeviceFontSubstitution extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定是否在打印机上启用设备字体替换。

span.span: Specifies whether device font substitution is enabled on a printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 纯文本，不的字体，发送到打印机时，可以更快打印。Printing is faster when only the text, not the font, is sent to the printer. 一些打印机具有永久存储在内存中的字体。Some printers have fonts that are permanently stored in their memory. 这些打印机使用户能够用打印的应用程序使用每个字体常驻打印机字体替换。These printers enable users to substitute a resident printer font for each font that is used by the printing application. 此类型的值主要用于以下目的：The values of this type are used primarily for these purposes: - 作为的成员集合、 属性，它们表示打印机的功能。As members of the collection, a property of , they represent the printer capabilities. - 值作为属性，它们指示打印机启用或禁用设备的打印作业的字体替换。As the value of the property of a , they instruct the printer to enable or disable device font substitution for the print job. 属性中从不使用的未知的值对象。The Unknown value is never used in properties of objects. 你决不能设置为未知的属性。You should never set a property to Unknown. 如果某一其他生成应用程序已创建将设备字体替换功能设置为无法识别的选项的 PrintTicket 文档 (即，一个选项，中未定义[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，然后构造与该文档的应用程序中的对象将具有未知的值作为属性。If some other producing application has created a PrintTicket document that sets the device font substitution feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have Unknown as the value of the property. 尽管和类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information, see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定打印机的功能并配置打印的作业，以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to determine printer capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution Off = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution On = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.DeviceFontSubstitution Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 该功能（其选项由此枚举表示）设置为未在[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定义的选项。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
